results.title: Reversible cardiac dysfunction in long-standing hypertension may be global variant of stress cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: Echocardiogram, cardiac MRI and catheterisation suggested @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@idiopathic dilated cardiomyopathy@@@, severe @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@systolic dysfunction@@@, ejection fraction 25% with global @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated_with_Left_Ventricular_Noncompaction @DISEASE_MESH:C565277 @@@left ventricular (LV) dilation@@@ and apical @<m>DISEASE_Thrombosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013927 @@@thrombus@@@. He responded well to diuretics and gradual uptitration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Carvedilol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077261 @@@carvedilol@@@.

citations.NLM: Chockalingam A, Kumar SA. Reversible cardiac dysfunction in long-standing hypertension may be global variant of stress cardiomyopathy. BMJ Case Rep. 2018 Jun 29;2018():. PMID: 29960964
